headline: Area 1 threat indicators now available in Cloudflare Zero Trust
keywords: Cloudflare One Week, Product News, Zero Trust, Email Security, Security, 1.1.1.1, Cloudflare Gateway, Cloudflare Zero Trust
description: Area 1’s massive datasets of phishing campaign TTPs, seed infrastructure and threat models are now combined with Cloudflare’s extensive network and global insight into the origins of DNS, email or web traffic
